SEARCH
Package server.database.questionDatabase

Class QuestionDatabaseHandler

java.lang.Object
server.database.questionDatabase.QuestionDatabaseHandler
public class QuestionDatabaseHandler extends Object
The `QuestionDatabaseHandler` class manages a collection of questions and provides methods for adding, retrieving, and managing questions in a database. It also allows loading questions from a file and appending new questions to it.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tomasz Zbroszczyk

  • Method Details

    • addQuestion

      public void addQuestion(String type, String questionText, String correct_answer, String[] answers)
      Adds a new question to the database with the specified type, question text, correct answer, and a list of answers.
      Parameters:
      type - The type or category of the question.
      questionText - The text of the question.
      correct_answer - The correct answer to the question.
      answers - An array of possible answers to the question.

    • getQuestionById

      public Question getQuestionById(int id)
      Retrieves a question by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the question to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The question with the specified ID, or `null` if not found.

    • sortQuestionsById

      public void sortQuestionsById()
      Sorts the questions in the database by their unique ID in ascending order.

    • loadQuestionsFromFile

      private void loadQuestionsFromFile()
      Loads questions from the question storage file into the database.

    • appendQuestionToFile

      private void appendQuestionToFile(Question question)
      Appends a new question to the end of the question storage file.
      Parameters:
      question - The question to append to the file.

    • getQuestions

      public LinkedList<Question> getQuestions()
      Gets a list of all questions stored in the database.
      Returns:
      A linked list of all questions.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of all questions in the database, joined with newline characters.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string containing all questions, each separated by a newline character.
